name: Project Helena
description:
Project Helena is a turn-based strategy/RPG game. Player has several units and has to destroy enemy bots. 

The turn-based battle system is similar to first X-coms, Jagged Alliance, Lost colony, etc.

Game made in Castle Game Engine / Free Pascal / Lazarus is Free and Open Source.

Download: https://github.com/eugeneloza/...

Source: https://github.com/eugeneloza/...
